summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 16, Law's Addition, being the alley from East Republican Street to East Mercer Street, between 15th Avenue North and 16th Avenue North, by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9879 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
